Synergy

Digital innovation ecosystem for sustainable innovation

Why Synergy?

Achieving the development of sustainable solutions is an intensive and rigorous process. This process usually requires the involvement of various stakeholders and associates to have access to diverse perspectives. Looking for those partners can time- and energy-consuming since sustainable innovation is a complex world where new ideas are constantly emerging. Furthermore, managing this collaboration can raise challenges for all involved parties. Synergy thus hopes to be a bridge for sustainable innovation by helping interested actors to collaborate.


Match-making

Search for the right partners to conduct innovation.


Knowledge

Access new information on your industry and your envrionment.


Publish

Share your work and innovation to attract attention.


Report

View your online behavior to better understand your market.

I developed this platform during my studies to represent the findings from my Master's thesis. The aim was initially to assess which features were critical to support digital innovation for sustainable value-creation. Now, the aim is to see the value that this platform can bring to other organizations. In case you are interested to learn more about it, simply follow the next steps.

How to join us

The steps needed to apply our methodology

Assess your own needs

Put a problem you are facing online

Search for problems you can help for
